Sewer Information
=================

Sewer Fees
----------

  

### Residential Customers - Individually Water Metered

  
Includes single family residences, single family manufactured homes, duplexes, triplexes, townhomes and any other multi-family dwelling building where each individual family dwelling unit or space is served by a separate water meter:  
  
$23.00 per month, plus $1.50 per thousand gallons of water usage in excess of 2,000 gallons   
 up to a monthly maximum charge of  $42.50 (15,000 gallon cap).  
  

### Residential Customers - Master Water Metered

Includes duplexes, triplexes, townhomes, apartment complexes, and any other multi-family dwelling buildings, and other hi-density residential dwelling buildings (other than those defined above as Residential Customers - Individually Water Metered) where each separate multi-family building is served by a single master water meter:  
  
(a) Each individual dwelling unit or space, occupied or not - $20.00 per month, plus  
(b) Each 1,000 gallons or portion thereof per month - $1.50 per thousand gallons of water usage   
 up to a monthly maximum sewer charge of $42.50 for each individual dwelling unit or space  
(c) The person or entity named on the master metered account will be responsible for the payment to the City of all fees billed for the  metered usage.  
  

### Commercial Customers

  
$30 per month plus $3.25 per thousand gallons of water usage in excess of 2,000 gallons.  
  

### Industrial / Institutional Customers

  
$100 per month plus $3.50 per thousand gallons of water usage in excess of 2,000 gallons.  
  

Sewer Connections
-----------------

  
Installation of sewer connections (taps) and service connections from the main to the property line or point of use connection is performed only by municipal employees or a contractor approve by the City. The following charges are made for sewer connections.

Sewer Tapping Fees
------------------

| Connection Size | With Road Cut Fee | Without Road Cut Fee |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 4 inch Connection | $500 | $700 |
| 6 inch Connection | Actual Cost to City | Actual Cost to City |
| 8 inch Connection | Actual Cost to City | Actual Cost to City |
